pages.text: $(thing)Porcelain$() blocks will only drop porcelain pieces when destroyed with a tool without $(thing)Silk Touch$() enchantment. The $(thing)Porcelain Pieces$() can be used as crafting material.

pages.title: Porcelain Piece
pages.text: $(item)Porcelain Pieces$() are dropped from most white and colored porcelain related blocks.

pages.title: Blue and White Porcelain
pages.text: $(thing)Blue and White Porcelain$() blocks will instead drop special pieces and shards. The $(item)Blue and White Porcelain Shards$() is the common drop, while the $(item)Blue and White Porcelain Piece$() is a rare drop. The drop rates are affected by the $(thing)Fortune$() enchantment.
$(item)Blue and White Porcelain Piece$() can used to make special tools and weapons.
